verses.roman:
pāyur yamasya mitrasya
parimokṣasya nārada
hiṁsāyā nirṛter mṛtyor
nirayasya gudaṁ smṛtaḥ

synonyms: pāyuḥ—the evacuating outlet; yamasya—the controlling deity of death; mitrasya—of Mitra; parimokṣasya—of the evacuating hole; nārada—O Nārada; hiṁsāyāḥ—of envy; nirṛteḥ—of misfortune; mṛtyoḥ—of death; nirayasya—of hell; gudam—the rectum; smṛtaḥ—is understood.
translation: O Nārada, the evacuating outlet of the universal form of the Lord is the abode of the controlling deity of death, Mitra, and the evacuating hole and the rectum of the Lord is the place of envy, misfortune, death, hell, etc.
